constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 82 (Wednesday, May 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DANNY K. DAVIS of Illinois:
H.R. 3142.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the Constitution and its subsequent amendments
and further clarified and interpreted by Supreme Court of the
United States.
[Page H2271]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Tax Parity for U.S. Mutual Funds Act of 2021
